channel.title: CVE Feed for Appmaker -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Appmaker -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-38680|2024-07-20T07:46:48.184Z -- appmaker -- appmaker%20%E2%80%93%20convert%20woocommerce%20to%20android%20%26%20ios%20native%20mobile%20apps
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Appmaker Appmaker – Convert WooCommerce to Android & iOS Native Mobile Apps allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Appmaker – Convert WooCommerce to Android & iOS Native Mobile Apps: from n/a through 1.36.12.
